metadata.title: CVE-2023-52591 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:reiserfs: Avoid touching renamed directory if parent does not change TheVFS will not be locking moved directory if its parent does not change.Change reiserfs rename code to avoid touching renamed directory if itsparent does not change as without locking that can corrupt the filesystem.

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
